name: Kafka | Honkai Star Rail
description:
Hello...

This is a LoRA for Kafka character from Honkai Star Rail, trained in Anythingv4.5 for 20 epochs with 23 images * 10 repeats,

its match the character pretty well with model like anything or any anime models, for more information you can see the image previews.

for the weight i recommended using around 0.6-0.8.

as for the trigger words, i think you can use

kafka hsr, long_hair, breasts, looking_at_viewer, smile, bangs, shirt, gloves, long_sleeves, purple_eyes, jacket, white_shirt, ponytail, purple_hair, parted_lips, white_gloves, sunglasses, eyewear_on_head, smoke, rain

i guess that is all, thanks you....

Edit:
So i forgot some images that i use for the preview using control net when looking for pose or propotions, Here some guide to use ControlNet

  • Go towards extensions tabs and install this extension, https://github.com/Mikubill/sd-webui-controlnet

  • Download ControlNet model (https://huggingface.co/lllyasviel/ControlNet/tree/main/models) (recomended the openpose one) and place it inside sd-webui-controlnet/models extension folder

  • After installing, a tab named Control Net should be appeared in txt2img or img2img

  • Open the tab and use this image as a guidelines, pretty much use openpose preprocessor and openpose model then place the image that you want to use inside the tab.

  • Sometimes this method not working, you can use openpose stickman instead, here my collection of openpose stickman (set preprocessor to none like this)

  • Then just generate images like usual, just leave the ControlNet enabled. the image should resemble the pose

ps im just gonna leave some of this here :>

pixiv

twitter

facebook
